title: Enable, disable replication/polling on solr master/slave from solrj component
description:
Have the ability to enable and disable the index replication from the solrj component. 

NOTE:  "enablepoll", "disablepoll", "enablereplication", and "disablereplication" are all supported "commands" for the /replication handler, so this can already be done from SolrJ – all that is really needed for this jira improvement is a convenience method, and posisbly automated code for looping over multiple slaves when enable/disable polling.
